Trade/Device Name(s): Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model GM650
GE Talking Blood Glucose Monitoring System, Model GE300
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Bionime Rightest Blood Glucose Monitoring System GM650 and GE Talking Blood Glucose Monitoring System GE300 for self-testing blood glucose levels using electrochemical technology
Indications for Use Summary: For single patient use at home by individuals with diabetes to quantitatively measure glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from fingertip, palm, and forearm as an aid to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use.
